DOC.brief_summary: In previous study , 90 % patient underwent elective cardiopulmonary bypass procedure manifest CD4 count less 500 cells/microliter immediate ( day 1 ) post-operative period . This study investigate whether Nelfinavir increase CD4 count post-operative period .
DOC.brief_title: Cardiopulmonary Bypass-Induced Lymphocytopenia Potential Effects Protease Inhibitor
DOC.criteria: Any patient undergoing elective ( nonemergency ) cardiopulmonary bypass coronary artery bypass grafting , cardiac valve replacement , . A dozen different medical condition two dozen medical contraindication .
